name: Sex Village
description:
Sex Village is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This game will immerse you in the story of one village in which stood a mysterious house. In this house there was a cellar, in which a sick maniac Kevin held a girl captive and raped her!

In this game, you will have to dive headfirst into the story of one girl who was locked up in the basement of one mysterious house in the village. This girl's name is Emilia. She has been living in this basement for many years and pleasuring old pervert Kevin. One day everything changes. She decides she doesn't want to please this old man anymore. So she comes up with a very ingenious plan to escape from this basement. Although the fear of the unknown frightened the girl, she still decided to take revenge on the old man ... What happened next you will see in the game. Get a real pleasure from very simple gameplay and cool music.

Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!
